content.raw:
eigen has a templated [AlignedBox class](https://eigen.tuxfamily.org/dox-devel/classEigen_1_1AlignedBox.html), and its `AlignedBox3d` specialization maps pretty closely to our AxisAlignedBox class.

I created a branch in ign-math to add conversion functions between these two types:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/branch/eigen3_AlignedBox_math5?dest=ign-math5#diff

the one caveat is that they have slightly different behavior, so converting a default-constructed `AxisAlignedBox` to eigen and back results in different values. I'll make a pull request for that branch and we can discuss it further there
